Summary: Two Years is a LONG Time
text: After 2 years, this took one too many headers off the stairs and broke into (large) pieces, which Destrcto-dog enjoyed chewing on (but not chewing up).  Smarter dog took a few hours to get the hang of this one -- she still barks at it occasionally - total crack up!  Destructo-dog was just baffled till there were pieces...  Good thing Smart dog shares!!
